helpSupport.title: Help & Support
helpSupport.linkbaseDescription: A place to store and recall connections with facts and socials.
helpSupport.howToAddConnection: How do I add a new connection?
helpSupport.addConnectionAnswer: Use the + button or the Voice Connections screen to add multiple.
helpSupport.searchAnswer: Yes, use the search bar. AI-powered search understands facts and context.
helpSupport.howToEdit: How do I edit a connection?
helpSupport.editAnswer: Open a connection and tap Edit to update details and facts.
helpSupport.deleteAnswer: Open the connection and use the Delete action in the menu.
helpSupport.offlineAnswer: Basic browsing works; some features (AI, voice) require internet.
helpSupport.privacyAnswer: See Privacy Policy in Settings for details about data handling.
helpSupport.howToBackup: How can I back up my data?
helpSupport.backupAnswer: Use Sync to set an email and enable SSO recovery across devices.
helpSupport.remindersAnswer: In Notifications, enable daily reminders and set your preferred time.
helpSupport.voiceConnectionsAnswer: Record audio to extract multiple connections automatically.
helpSupport.themesAnswer: In Appearance, switch between Exo, Warm Pastel, and Light Mode.
helpSupport.whyNeedEmail: Why do I need an email?
helpSupport.emailAnswer: To enable SSO recovery and sync across devices.
helpSupport.audioAnswer: Audio is processed to text for extraction. See Privacy for details.
helpSupport.reminderTimeAnswer: Yes, in Notifications. Default is 10:00 PM.
helpSupport.synonymsAnswer: Yes, include query expansion for better recall.
helpSupport.socialMediaAnswer: We generate URLs from handles where possible.
helpSupport.resetThemeAnswer: Open Appearance and reselect your preferred theme.
